s.text: A lawmaker who was there tells the Post that Gingrich also told the group, "I want you to forget the word 'scandals' and start using the word 'crimes.
The Post reports that in a closed-door Republican House meeting, Newt Gingrich referred to Burton's investigation of President Clinton as a "circus."
A lawmaker who was there tells the Post that Gingrich also told the group, "I want you to forget the word 'scandals' and start using the word 'crimes.
USAT 's off-lead reports that at yesterday's presidential press conference, the first questioner asked Bill Clinton to distinguish between his case and Richard Nixon's use of executive privilege.
